name: Find, Fling, Repeat
description:
HOW TO PLAY:

You're an astronaut who has been separated from your ship, & now you're about to be sucked into a black hole! Move around with WASD & control your tractor beam with your mouse to fling asteroids away from the black hole, & delay the inevitable of it getting bigger & consuming you! Using the tractor beam costs energy, so replenish it using batteries scattered across space! Due to their charge, batteries can't be picked up by the tractor beam! Happy beaming!

CONTROLS:

Move - WASD

Move Tractor Beam - Mouse

Shoot Tractor Beam - Left Mouse Button

CREDITS:

Jamchills - Code, Art, SFX, "Music"

Tinyworlds - Font (Thaleah Fat)
